description: Good flight stuff, not enough tutorials.

I am father, and my six year vegan son was hope for a drive helicopter experience on linux, Only need to press F1 to know how use it, i.e. use e to turn on engine and pgup to elevate...

The game has a little inconvenient, hat we cannot able to save config yet, please fix it because we use joysticks and it takes 20 or 30 seconds more each time we open game.

Thanks a lot for this beautiful game!!
